head.title: I.B.M. Taking Part In a Bach Project

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet
Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

hedline.hl1: I.B.M. Taking Part In a Bach Project

abstract.p: International Business Machines and New York State Library in Berlin, in collaboration with eight other institutions, join in developing digital database of handwritten manuscripts and musical scores by Johann Sebastian Bach; logo (S)

block.p: International Business Machines and the State Library in Berlin, in collaboration with eight other institutions, have joined together to develop the Bach Digital Project -- a Web site devoted to the works and life of Johann Sebastian Bach.

The site is www.bachdigital.org, a digital database of Bach's handwritten manuscripts and select musical scores. It offers in one library most of Bach's existing original scores for the first time, and in a format that will be accessible to the public.

International Business Machines and the State Library in Berlin, in collaboration with eight other institutions, have joined together to develop the Bach Digital Project -- a Web site devoted to the works and life of Johann Sebastian Bach.

The site is www.bachdigital.org, a digital database of Bach's handwritten manuscripts and select musical scores. It offers in one library most of Bach's existing original scores for the first time, and in a format that will be accessible to the public.
The I.B.M. Digital Library is responsible for storing, administering and distributing the digital information so that scientific work can be performed on the stored documents.
